title: The Store.
body: Is the store available yet? It's grayed out, but if you mouse over it it doesn't say "Not Implemented" anymore.

replies.body: The store was meant to be enabled, but we had to disable it again. We were seeing some strange behavior and we are currently investigating.
same problem for me, can any riot employees explain?{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
I had a physical button for the store earlier today (Right after alpha came back online) But if I clicked it, it glitched out my client and nothing popped up...

Yeah my store button appears lit up right after I log in but after a few seconds it greys out I actually managed to click on it once before it greyed out but nothing appears (aside from the little indicator that pops up under your current "tab")

i can't open it either. It is also greyed out. But the store mostly functions as a browser so they just have to enable it prob later this patch cycle.
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
